description: Example codes indicating the reason why a CommunicationRequest is on hold or revoked. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.
name: CommunicationRequestStatusReason

text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    281323002Insufficient requesting detail
    397709008Patient died (finding)
    105480006Refusal of treatment by patient
    719500002Left care setting having refused treatment (finding)
    445060000Left against medical advice (finding)
    704273008Consent declined for examination of cardiovascular system
    704274002Consent declined for examination of central nervous system (finding)
    704458005Consent declined for examination of gastrointestinal system (finding)
    704275001Consent declined for examination of genitourinary system
    704276000Consent declined for examination of musculoskeletal system
    704277009Consent declined for examination of respiratory system
    310376006Immunization consent not given
    414859005No consent for electronic record sharing (finding)
    416409005Refused consent for upload to local shared electronic record (finding)
    416308001Refused consent for upload to national shared electronic record (finding)
    737038009Declined consent for treatment (finding)
    713835001Declined consent for use of patient data in risk stratification for unplanned hospital admission
    398227009Inadequate consent (finding)

title: CommunicationRequest Status Reason
